text: My 2 kids has been taking lessons from Han Laoshi since primary to secondary school. She identifies and helps with their area of weakness, making the lessons effective. My kids say she is caring, flexible and always available to discuss with them.
My kids absolutely loves Han Laoshi! One started with her since Kindy and the eldest is still with her at Secondary level. She is patient and instills in the children a love for the language.

5 months in i noticed that my son is communicating in mandarin more. He is more confident speaking in mandarin now and i can see an improvement in his school work as well. This is all credits to Han laoshi ðŸ˜Š
